education.degree: First Class Honours, Bachelor's of Applied Science in Computer Engineering

bullets: Develop and enhance features for ClearEstate's platform using Laravel PHP and Vue.js.
Optimize codebase for performance, scalability, and reliability through reviews.
Collaborate with product managers and designers to streamline estate management.
Utilize Git and Jira for version control and timely project delivery.
Co-founded a loyalty rewards app, architecting a full ecosystem with React Native, Laravel PHP, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL.
Led full-stack development of a production-ready platform with QR code point collection, rewards management, and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
Exited the company for $20,000 after 19 months, showcasing strong product-market fit and technical execution.
Co-founder and lead software engineer at Pursuit Labs, focusing on AI-driven solutions.
Led development of full-stack web applications, including UI/UX and backend services.
Secured 2nd place and $5,000 funding at 2021 CUCAI for product innovation.

projects.name: Workout Analysis App
bullets: Led development of WorkoutPal, a workout analysis app using YoloV8 for feedback.
Designed an end-to-end ML pipeline serving model inference to a SwiftUI app on AWS.
